attributes.action: Scrap the 70 mph speed limit on motorways at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great stretches of our motorway system are almost devoid of traffic at night.We need to encourage people to make more journeys at this time to redistribute the traffic load. Allowing drivers to get to their destination quickly at night would be a great incentive and a great vote winner and would not compromise safety.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
